text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: There, that's all of today's drills!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin's training is going well,<n>and she's getting into
the swing of it.<n>But something is still missing...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Really nice results today! You're<n>almost ready for the next
race!

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
For real?! Hehehe, guess I better get<n>ready for my big
reward, huh? ♪

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there it is! Sure thing, lemme just<n>make a reservation
for that premium<n>dessert buffet you've been dreaming<n>
about!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing other trainers with their racers,<n>I can't help but
think...
choice_data_list: (I might need to get to know Taishin better...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For the most part, I only see her<n>during training. I know next
to nothing<n>about Taishin herself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What? I did all my routines. Am I<n>missing something?
choice_data_list: Is there anywhere you'd like to go?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Not really. I don't have time to keep<n>you company anyway.
I'm gonna cool<n>down and head back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And she's gone... Hopefully I'll get to<n>know her better as
we train more.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, a letter goes out to all<n>faculty. It turns out to be a
bonus from<n>the academy—tickets to an aquarium.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I would've invited Taishin, but she<n>turned me down last
time I tried. So, I<n>head off by myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a small aquarium in the suburbs,<n>quiet and with only a
sprinkling of<n>visitors.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...One of whom I recognize.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While I debate whether to say<n>something, she mumbles to
herself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...What's next?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something's different than usual.<n>Perplexed, I watch silently
as she<n>drifts off to another area.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But it's a small aquarium, and as I<n>stroll around, I wind up
seeing her<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's standing by the<n>"Fishy-Fun-Time" touch tank, staring<n>
down the doctorfish inside.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Here I go.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She cautiously checks if anyone is<n>around, then gathers her
courage and<n>dips a hand in.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her worry melts away as the<n>squirming fish tickles her
fingers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Later, as the sun begins to set...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There are barely any visitors now.<n>The aquarium is still and
noiseless as<n>the deep sea.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And all alone, joyfully snapping pics<n>of the energetic sea
creatures, is<n>Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For someone who hates groups, she<n>has an awfully big
smile looking at the<n>school of fish.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha! It's you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I freeze like a deer in headlights. A<n>wave of embarrassment
washes over<n>me as I struggle to reply.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Smooth. If she realizes I waswatching her, I don't even want tothink how mad she'll be...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's always like this here, you know.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She smiles, not a hint of anger to be<n>heard in her voice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe it's the tranquil blue<n>ambience... but she seems so
gentle.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
There's another bigger, fancier<n>aquarium nearby. So pretty
much<n>everyone goes there now.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's why it's always quiet here.<n>Most come by
themselves. And<n>they're all fish-lovers, so they just<n>stare
at the tanks the whole time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: They don't give a second thought to<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She pauses, her words fading into the<n>background music.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For all the time we've spent together,<n>I've never seen her
make a face like<n>this.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
But how about you, fishies? I wonder<n>if they notice me...
Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Whatever, it doesn't matter. They<n>aren't really watching.
They're just<n>around.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's fine... I like it that way—makes it<n>easier for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hm? Hey, what's that grin for?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That so? You're kinda weird<n>sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well, I gotta go. This place closes<n>pretty early, so watch out.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look on as the mysterious<n>aquarium-goer disappears into
the<n>distance.
choice_data_list: (This turned out to be a pretty great day.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Hopefully, it's a sign of progress.

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Whoo-hoo! A new record! Hey,<n>maybe it's time to make
reservations<n>for the premium dessert buffet, huh?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hold on a minute! Breaking your<n>record's amazing, but the
dessert's<n>your big prize for when you win the<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The banter between trainer and<n>trainee looks fun, but this
time... I feel<n>a little less envious.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yep... Enough chitchat though. Let's<n>keep it moving.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Umm, is it me, or are you crazy happy<n>today?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I've come to realize that I'm happy<n>the way things are.
